OIDcAuth.title: OIDC Authentication
OIDcAuth.text: To be replaced with the OIDC provider UI

QrScanner.missingPermissionText: This app uses the camera to scan the QR code of another device.

AuthScreen.header: Would you like to use biometrics to unlock the application?

errors.unenrolled: To use Biometrics, please enroll your biometrics in your device settings
errors.generic: There seems to be an error in Biometrics authentication

DownloadingVcModal.bodyText: This may take some time, we will notify you when your {{vcLabel}} has been downloaded and is available

GetIdInputModal.header: To retrieve your UIN or VID, enter your application {{vcLabel}} number
GetIdInputModal.qstnMarkToolTip: Application {{vcLabel}} Number is printed on the acknowledgment provided after enrollment

IdInputModal.header: Enter the MOSIP-provided UIN or VID of the {{vcLabel}} you wish to retrieve
IdInputModal.noUIN/VID: Don't have your UIN/VID? Get it here

OtpVerificationModal.enterOtp: Enter the 6-digit verification code we sent you

MyVcsTab.generateVcDescription: Tap on "Add {{vcLabel}}" below to download your {{vcLabel}}

OnboardingOverlay.stepOneText: Keep your digital credential with you at all times. To get started, add {{vcLabel}} to your profile.
OnboardingOverlay.stepTwoText: Once generated, {{vcLabel}} are safely stored on your mobile and can be renamed or shared at any time.
OnboardingOverlay.stepThreeText: Share and receive {{vcLabel}} swiftly using your phone camera to scan QR codes.

ReceivedVcsTab.noReceivedVcsText: Tap on Request below to receive {{vcLabel}}

ViewVcModal.revoking: Your wallet contains a credential with VID {{vid}}. Revoking this will automatically remove the same from the wallet. Are you sure you want to proceed?

success.revoked: VID {{vid}} has been revoked. Any credential containing the same will be removed automatically from the wallet

PasscodeScreen.header: Set a passcode to secure your application

ProfileScreen.name: Name
ProfileScreen.revokingVids: You are about to revoke ({{count}}) VIDs.
ProfileScreen.revokingVidsAfter:
This means you will no longer be able to use or view any of the IDs linked to those VID(s). 
Are you sure you want to proceed?

RequestScreen.bluetoothDenied: Please enable Bluetooth to be able to request {{vcLabel}}
RequestScreen.showQrCode: Show this QR code to request {{vcLabel}}

disconnected.title: Disconnected
disconnected.message: The connection was interrupted. Please try again.

exchangingDeviceInfo.timeoutHint: It's taking too long to exchange device info...

connected.message: Connected to the device. Waiting for {{vcLabel}}...
connected.timeoutHint: No data received yet. Is sending device still connected?

locationDisabled.message: Location services must be enabled for the scanning functionality

locationDenied.message: Location permission is required for the scanning functionality

status.connectingTimeout: It's taking a while to establish the connection. Is the other device open for connections?
status.exchangingDeviceInfoTimeout: It's taking a while to exchange device info. You may have to reconnect.

SelectVcOverlay.chooseVc: Choose the {{vcLabel}} you'd like to share with

sharing.title: Sharing...
sharing.hint: Please wait for the receiving device to accept or reject the share.
sharing.timeoutHint: It's taking longer than expected to share. There could be a problem with the connection.

accepted.title: Success!
accepted.message: Your {{vcLabel}} has been successfully shared with {{receiver}}

SendVcScreen.consentToPhotoVerification: I give consent to have my photo taken for authentication

invalidIdentity.title: Unable to verify identity
invalidIdentity.message: An error occurred and we couldn't scan your portrait. Try again, make sure your face is visible, devoid of any accessories.
invalidIdentity.messageNoRetry: An error occurred and we couldn't scan your portrait.

errors.missingPermission: This app uses the camera to scan the QR code of another device.
